entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Page Navigation events currently don't fire with Shell #11241
    Backlog
  • Unable to set Pane1Length or Pane2Length in XAML on TwoPaneView #11240
    Backlog
  • WinUI Shell doesn't re-layout flyout items when switching between different Locked FlyoutWidths #11239
    Backlog
  • Selected Visual States no longer work correctly #11238
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI UI Testing Strategy #11236
    Backlog
  • Fix Legacy Control Gallery so it's an equally runnable state that it was for Xamarin.Forms #11235
    Backlog
  • Setup Appium based project in order to validate Appium based UI Test Strategy #11232
    Backlog
  • [Android] Loading image from stream throws Java.Lang.RuntimeException when large sized image view is used #11230
    Backlog
  • [iOS] An SSL error when sending request to server with self-signed certificate #11225
  • Errors after upgrading app from framework 6 to 7. #11217
    Backlog
  • [Android 13] - MediaPicker - Permissions issue #11211
    Backlog
  • Map pin MarkerClicked event doesn't allow zoom in on pin location #11209
  • Button ImageSource #11205
    Backlog

Closed

  • Breaking changes in .NET MAUI for .NET 7 #11237
  • Maui Email ComposeAsync Fails on Windows but works on Android #11218
    Backlog
  • iOS app fails when deployed to TestFlight using NotificationHubClient #11131
  • Can't specify the color of an SVG image #11141
  • Unable to run MAUI project with Samsung Tab A7 #11231
  • Grid layout applies ColumnSpacing and RowSpacing to invisible children #11222
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Content goes out of screen bounds while using modal #11104
    Backlog
  • [Windows] TabbedPage inside Navigation page causes Crash #8009
  • Microsoft.Maui.Platform.HandlerNotFoundException: 'Handler not found for view Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Maps.Map.' #11169
    Backlog
  • dotnet workload not work when l update to .net 7! #11210
  • [Windows] MAUI Controls does not render anymore correctly after latest update #11045

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Entry ClearButtonVisibilityProperty pointing to SelectionLength #11234
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [net7.0] Remove dead IScreenshotResult XML Doc link #11233
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Fix up the Shipped/Unshipped APIs #11228
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Increase timeout to 240 minutes of azdo stages #11226
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add nicer metadata to our NuGet packages #11219
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22553.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22559.1 #11216
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.VisualStudio.DesignTools.Extensibility from 17.3.32804.24 to 17.4.33103.184 #11215
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix being unable to access some resources #11214
    community ✨
  • Try creating workload packs instead #11206
    area/setup 🪄

Merged

  • Remove dead IScreenshotResult XML Doc link #11223
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Remove obsolete comment in Controls.Foldable.csproj #11212
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update URL in Code of Conduct #11224

Updated

  • If a UISwitch grows too wide it is no longer accessible #10946
    area/a11y
  • Merge net7 to main #11202
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10985
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
